info: This gear has been altered by druidic magic, increasing its <good>protection</good>.
This gear has been altered by druidic magic, increasing its <good>acid and fire resistance</good>, and reducing its <info>warmth</info>.
This gear has been altered by druidic magic, reducing its <good>encumbrance</good>.
Prevents you from using any Arcana magic.
Prevents you from summonming any monsters.
Prevents you from using any blood magic.
Prevents you from using any sanguine marks.

//: A monster that uses a lot of magic, for detection magic purposes.
